data: Hi there! This is Stride and I am a conversation that lives on a website.

action: _this.addBlock('Welcome ' + input + '! Thanks for checking us out.')

options.action: _this.addBlock('Maybe this will make you feel better.')

data: Let me tell you a bit more about Stride.
With Stride you can create interactive Landing pages for your website.
It's as easy as writing a story for your visitors.
title: Choose an Option

data: With basic JSON and JavaScript knowledge, you can easily write your own Stride Story.
Ready to get started? Check out our Github Link.
